law.catch_line: An applicant for a permit shall:...

text.section:
An applicant for a permit shall:
submit to the Board an application on the form that the Board provides; and
pay to the Board the nonrefundable application fee set by the Board.

In addition to any other information required on an application form, the form shall require the name and address of:
each responsible member of a corporation or partnership;
each officer and shareholder of a corporation; and
each partner of a partnership.
